channel.title: How did you maintain this good community?
channel.description:
After having been in countless Linux forums of all sorts, It's the first one I've seen in all my life, where people discuss the components of the OS in the forums or criticize it without being flamed O_O?
The attitude here is light years ahead other distros!
Seriously, what's your secret sauce you're using to keep a positive attitude after all these years?

item.title: How did you maintain this good community?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Thank you.

Not sure I have a good answer for this. Perhaps this helps:
https://forums.whonix.org/tag/project-philosophy

Read full topic
item.source: How did you maintain this good community?

item.title: How did you maintain this good community?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Qaxqmsl110:

Seriously, what’s your secret sauce you’re using to keep a positive attitude after all these years?

A friendly community where we have productive discussions.

Read full topic
